gov.usgs.anss.cd11send

Class CD11SenderReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.cd11send.CD11SenderReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CD11SenderReader
extends java.lang.Thread
    this inner class reads and writes data to a CD1.1 client with the data It needs to handle all DataFrame, CommandFrames, and send out AckNacks

    • Constructor Detail

      • CD11SenderReader

        public CD11SenderReader(java.net.Socket s,
                        java.lang.String stat,
                        CD11SenderClient parent)
        This class reads and writes data on an open socket to a CD1.1 data socket. It gets the connection from the parent CD11SenderReader.
        Parameters:
        s - The socket on which to perform data I/O
        stat - The station name for tags
        parent - the edgethread to use for logging
